mapper.insert: insert into api_log ( project_id, execute_strategy_id, test_case_id, api_request_id, url, msg, status, `time`, exec_time, is_available, is_deleted, create_time, update_time ) values ( #{projectId}, #{executeStrategyId}, #{testCaseId}, #{apiRequestId}, #{url}, #{msg}, #{status}, #{time}, #{execTime}, #{isAvailable}, #{isDeleted}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )

insert into api_log ( project_id, execute_strategy_id, test_case_id, api_request_id, url, msg, status, `time`, exec_time, is_available, is_deleted, create_time, update_time ) values
( #{obj.projectId}, #{obj.executeStrategyId}, #{obj.testCaseId}, #{obj.apiRequestId}, #{obj.url}, #{obj.msg}, #{obj.status}, #{obj.time}, #{obj.execTime}, #{obj.isAvailable}, #{obj.isDeleted}, #{obj.createTime}, #{obj.updateTime} )
mapper.update:
update api_log
project_id = #{projectId},
execute_strategy_id = #{executeStrategyId},
test_case_id = #{testCaseId},
api_request_id = #{apiRequestId},
url = #{url},
msg = #{msg},
status = #{status},
`time` = #{time},
exec_time = #{execTime},
is_available = #{isAvailable},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
update api_log set is_deleted = 1 where id = #{value}
mapper.select: select * from api_log t where id = #{value}

select * from api_log t where is_deleted = 0
order by id desc

select status, count(1) as count from api_log t where is_deleted = 0
group by status

select DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as date, COUNT(IF(status = 1, 1, NULL)) as 'status1', COUNT(IF(status = 2, 1, NULL)) as 'status2', COUNT(IF(status = 3, 1, NULL)) as 'status3' from api_log t where is_deleted = 0
group by DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')

select api.*, t.url as 'reqUrl', t.time, t.exec_time, t.msg from api_request api, api_log t where api.id = t.api_request_id and api.is_deleted = 0 and t.is_deleted = 0 and api.is_available = 1
order by t.time desc limit 20
